item.title: BOM展开
item.description: SAP BOM读取逻辑 相关表 MAST：Material BOM STKO : BOM Header STPO : BOM Positions (detail) MAPL : Assignment fo Task Lists to Materials PLKO : Routing Group Header PLSO : Routing Group Sequence PLPO : Routing Group Operations AFKO : Production Order Header AFPO : Production Order Position (details) 可用
